bulckUploadGuide.title: Instructions for Data Entry
bulckUploadGuide.content: <list><item><bold>Context:</bold> Describe the context of the role (optional). Up to 200 characters are allowed.</item><item><bold>IsVolunteer:</bold> Indicate whether this is a volunteer role. Enter 'true' or 'false' (without quotes).</item><item><bold>IsWorkingFromHomeAddress:</bold> Specify whether workers will be working from  their home address. Enter 'true' or 'false' (without quotes).</item><item><bold>DBS Level:</bold> Choose from the following values to specify the highest DBS level for which this role is eligible:<list><item>basic</item><item>standard</item><item>enhanced</item><item>enhanced-with-child-barred-list</item><item>enhanced-with-adult-barred-list</item><item>enhanced-with-child-and-adult-barred-list</item></list></item><item><bold>Workforce Type:</bold> Choose a number from 0 to 4 to indicate the  appropriate workforce for this role. Enter 0 if the role is eligible  only for a basic DBS check.<list><item>0 (NA)</item><item>1 (Child)</item><item>2 (Adult)</item><item>3 (Child and  Adult)</item><item>4 (Other)</item></list></item></list>

jobRoles.ImportListTooLongErrorMessage: Gellir mewnforio hyd at uchafswm o 100 o eitemau ar y tro.

datagrid.emptyRows: Ni ddaethpwyd o hyd i ganlyniadau yn cyfateb i'r meini prawf a bennwyd

snackbar.error: Rydyn ni wedi dod ar draws mater, ond mae ein tîm peirianneg eisoes yn gweithio arno. Rydym yn ymddiheuro am unrhyw anghyfleustra, ac rydym yn gwerthfawrogi eich amynedd.
